fullText: The musical comedy 'Head Over Heels,' which opened Thursday at the Hudson Theatre, is a jukebox musical built around the hits of the Go-Go's that tells a story loosely based on Sir Philip Sidney's 16th-century prose romance 'The Countess of Pembroke's Arcadia.'
